import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function CreateProduct() { function handlesubmit(event){ event.preventDefault() const formData = new FormData(event.target) const product = Object.fromEntries(formData.entries()) if(!product.name || !product.brand || !product.category || !product.price || !product.description || !product.image.name){ alert("Please fill all the fields!") return } try{ fetch("http://localhost:4000/admin/products",{ method: "POST", body: formData }) } catch(error){ } } return (

Create Product
